Package moulton.scalable.clickables

Class RadioGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • moulton.scalable.clickables.RadioGroup
  • public class RadioGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds RadioButtons. Only one button in the group can be selected at a time.
    Author:
    Matthew Moulton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.LinkedList<RadioButton> group
      The radio buttons in this group.
      protected RadioButton selected
      The radio button that is selected.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RadioGroup()
      Creates a new radio group.
      RadioGroup​(RadioButton... buttons)
      Creates a new radio group and adds the buttons specified to the group.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addButton​(RadioButton rb)
      Adds the button provided to the group if not already added.
      RadioButton getSelected()
      The radio button in this group that is currently selected.
      boolean removeButton​(RadioButton rb)
      Removes the specified button from the group.
      void select​(RadioButton selected)
      Selects this radio button and deselects all others in this group

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • group

        protected java.util.LinkedList<RadioButton> group
        The radio buttons in this group. Add buttons with addButton(RadioButton) and if necessary, remove them with removeButton(RadioButton).

      • selected

        protected RadioButton selected
        The radio button that is selected. Only one at a time.
        See Also:
        }, select(RadioButton)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioGroup

        public RadioGroup()
        Creates a new radio group. Though it is not useful until buttons are added.
        See Also:
        addButton(RadioButton)

      • RadioGroup

        public RadioGroup​(RadioButton... buttons)
        Creates a new radio group and adds the buttons specified to the group.
        Parameters:
        buttons - the buttons to be added to the group

    • Method Detail

      • addButton

        public void addButton​(RadioButton rb)
        Adds the button provided to the group if not already added. Updates the button's group to this.
        Parameters:
        rb - the button to add
        See Also:
        removeButton(RadioButton)

      • removeButton

        public boolean removeButton​(RadioButton rb)
        Removes the specified button from the group. Updates the button's group to null.
        Parameters:
        rb - the button to remove
        Returns:
        whether the button was found to be removed
        See Also:
        addButton(RadioButton)

      • select

        public void select​(RadioButton selected)
        Selects this radio button and deselects all others in this group
        Parameters:
        selected - the radio button to be selected
        See Also:
        getSelected()

      • getSelected

        public RadioButton getSelected()
        The radio button in this group that is currently selected. Only one button is allowed to be selected at a time.
        Returns:
        the presently selected button in the group
